concept.title: System Properties
concept.shortdesc: The following table describes the security-related system properties in the gfcpp.properties file for native client authentication and authorization.

table.title: System Properties for Client Authentication and Authorization

row.entry: Sets the key for the AuthInitialize factory function.
Registers the path to the securityImpl.dll library.
Returns the Diffie-Hellman secret key cipher algorithm.

entry.p: Specifies the path to a .pem file, which contains the public certificates for all GemFire cache servers to which the client can connect through specified endpoints.
Specifies the password for the public key file store on the client.

row.entry: Specifies the path to the public keystore.
Specifies the alias name for the key in the keystore.
Sets the password for the password-protected keystore.

entry.p: Enables SSL-based client/server communication when set to true. The default is false, which causes communication to use plain socket connections. When this is set to true, the other ssl-* settings are required.
Specifies the name of the .PEM keystore file, containing the client’s private key. Not set by default. Required if ssl-enabled is true.
Specifies the name of the .PEM truststore file, containing the servers’ public certificate. Not set by default. Required if ssl-enabled is true.
